channel.title: theory-cs on Girish Varma
channel.description: Recent content in theory-cs on Girish Varma

item.title: Linear Algebra II
item.description: An introduction to intermediate level topics in Linear Algebra by a series of questions and answers. All materials including videos, notes, assignments is provided here. The textbooks used are also openly available.

item.title: Generalized Parametric Path Problems
item.description: Parametric path problems arise independently in diverse domains, ranging from transportation to finance, where they are studied under various assumptions. We formulate a general path problem with relaxed assumptions, and describe how this formulation is applicable in these domains. We study the complexity of the general problem, and a variant of it where preprocessing is allowed. We show that when the parametric weights are linear functions, algorithms remain tractable even under our relaxed assumptions.

item.title: Markov Chain Monte Carlo: Theory, Applications and Interdisciplinary Problems
item.description: A project oriented course on theory and applications of MCMC techniques.

item.title: Modern Complexity Theory (Monsoon 2020)
item.description: A first undergraduate course on Computational Complexity Theory.

item.title: Probabilistic Graphical Models
item.description: Probabilistic Graphical Models refers to i.) concise representations of probability distributions using graphs ii.) efficient algorithms for sampling distributions represented in such form iii.) learning these representations from data.

item.title: Advanced Mathematical Structures
item.description: A broad set of intermediate and advanced level topics in Algebra, Combinatorics, Probability and Graph Theory.

item.title: Complexity Theory
item.description: A short 12 lecture course on Computational Complexity Theory.
